analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of EthPyramid.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#52-53) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of EthPyramid.dividends (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#202) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_t' of DayTrader.epcwallet (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#503) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_timeout' of DayTrader.setTimeout (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#544) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_startingPrice' of DayTrader.setStartingPrice (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#552-553) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of DayTrader._addressNotNull (/unique_contracts/0xe520035ae79e2cda8b9c1983fe810ea57bf5ccbc.sol#681) is not in mixedCase
